titles.title: Estate Tax Simplification Act
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to impose a 20 percent rate of tax on taxable estates and gifts.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 9/21/2001--Introduced. Estate Tax Simplification Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to revise current estate and gift tax rates to provide that the tax rate shall be 20 percent for estates and 20 percent for gifts.
